    • addCrew

      public void addCrew(CrewType type)
      Adds a crew member of the specified type to the housing tile. Performs validations to ensure the type is supported, and that the tile has enough capacity for the crew member.
      Overrides:
      addCrew in class Tile
      Parameters:
      type - the CrewType representing the type of crew member to add.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the provided type is null.
      RuntimeException - if the provided type is not supported by this tile.
      RuntimeException - if the housing tile has reached its crew capacity.

    • getNumCrew

      public Integer getNumCrew()
      Overrides:
      getNumCrew in class Tile
      Returns:
      the number of crew members as an Integer

    • getHostedCrewType

      public CrewType getHostedCrewType()
      Overrides:
      getHostedCrewType in class Tile
      Returns:
      the CrewType representing the currently hosted crew type on this tile.

    • removeCrewMember

      public CrewType removeCrewMember()
      Removes a crew member from the housing tile. If this tile no longer contains any crew members after the removal, the hosted crew type is set to null.
      Overrides:
      removeCrewMember in class Tile
      Returns:
      the CrewType of the removed crew member.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there are no crew members to remove.

    • broken

      public void broken(Ship ship, int x, int y)
      removes aliens from ship's crewMap attribute removes this tile from connected AlienSupportTile's list adjacentHousingTiles
      Overrides:
      broken in class Tile
      Parameters:
      ship - player's Ship
      x - int
      y - int

    • place

      public void place(Ship ship, int x, int y)
      adds HUMANS to this tile supportedCrewType, adds 2 HUMANS to this tile and ship attribute crewMap if this tile is connected to a AlienSupportTile removes the humans, adds the adjacent AlienSupportTile's supportedAlienColor attribute to this.supportedCrewType adds this tile to the connected AlienSupportTile list adjacentHousingTiles
      Overrides:
      place in class Tile
      Parameters:
      ship - player's Ship
      x - int
      y - int
